page.title: 07Family life in Kingswood
page.content: {A typical Saturday}for my family starts at 7.30 a.m. My Dad wakes everyone up when he turns on the radio and he is making our breakfast. I have to take my dog for a walk. We drive to the{shopping centre}and my mum buys all the food we need. It takes 10 minutes to drive to my grandmother's house. We stay with her for lunch and then my Dad and I go to watch a{rugby {match.}My Dad sometimes plays for the team. After picking up my mum and gran we go home for tea. My sister and I usually watch{television}while mum and dad get ready to go out for the evening. My gran looks after us so that mum and dad can go out to the{ {club}for a drink or a meal. Sometimes we play{cards or board games,}or if it is fine I am allowed out on my{bike} with my friends. I have a{shower,}eat my{supper}and go to bed at 10 p.m.
